productName.title: productName
productName.description: After receiving json pick the "product Name" and set it in this input

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description:
After receiving input, extract the value of the Quantity field.
Ensure that the extracted value is numeric, greater than zero, and passed as the "quantity" input to the delivery calculation action. If Quantity is not found then take it as 0. If User enter the input and time duration is found in that input then mark the quantity as 0 , for example : "How many x-ray machines can we deliver in next 6 months?"

timeDuration.title: timeDuration
timeDuration.description: After receiving json pick the Time duration. This Timeduration can be in days , weeks , months or years and convert this time into days and set the time duration as number of days in integer value only. If time duration is not found then take it as 0.
